DATE_HANDLING.user_specified_dates: If user provides specific dates, use those EXACT dates - do not modify them
DATE_HANDLING.no_date_specified: Only if user provides NO dates at all, then use gte = start_of_current_month, lte = current_datetime
DATE_HANDLING.format: CRITICAL: Always use dd/MM/yyyy format for dates in query JSON, never use ISO format
DATE_HANDLING.exact_conversion: Convert user dates exactly as provided - do not round to month start or end

FIELD_TYPES.keyword: use term query for exact match
FIELD_TYPES.long: use term query for exact match

NESTED_DETECTION.rule: if field path contains nested parent, wrap in nested query structure
